name: P.C.D
description:
This is my first game I've ever made on game maker and I hope you like it, it may not be that good. But its kinda fun

The game is about completeing levels that are mazes to win the game, along the way it will get harder as you go.

It may say that the application will harm your computer but its not because it says unknown publisher.

Also I hope Pewdiepie plays this i am a subscriber of him.

Enjoy

-av28

P.S you will have to download the game in order to play it.

how to move: arrow keys

how to open the door: press E
